item.description:
Meet your peers in a light-hearted environment and get more information about global trends and future opportunities in foreign direct investment in the biotechnology sector. fDi Intelligence will be sharing its latest data on foreign direct investment (FDI) in the sector on June 18th, in the BIO Meetup Area, Booth 1211, 4 pm – 5 pm.
As the fDi research department is located in Belfast we will hold an Irish-themed Meetup, with Guiness all around. Answer these three questions
https://www.fdiintelligence.com/content/download/40986/977911/file/0325-FDI-Competition%20form-v2.pdf
and attend the Meetup for the chance to win $100 in iTunes vouchers.

Please note in order to access the Meetup attendees need to have at least an “Exhibition Access” pass (the basic level) for the 2012 BIO International Convention.
item.name: Biotechnology foreign direct investment Meetup
